1307000.name: Methods: The Detective Competition Soundtrack
1307000.description:
The official soundtrack for Methods — approximately two and a half hours of music.

Composed by OddTillTheEnd.

"Circle of Squares" Guitar by Vanja Grastic

"Possibilities (End Credits)", "Red Office", "Theories", "Illusion Murders Credits" Saxophone by Oleg Lavrentev

"Theories" Drums by Matteo Rebulla

Tracks have been modified to have endings instead of looping.

Special Content

  • Theme from the first trailer
